channel.title: CBP Border Wait Times
channel.description: Estimated wait times for reaching the primary inspection booth, the first point of contact with CBP when crossing the Canada/U.S. and Mexico/U.S. land borders. Each border location updates its estimated wait times hourly.

item.title: Calexico - East
item.description:
Hours: 6 am-Midnight
Date: 11/23/2021
Passenger Vehicles Maximum Lanes: 8
General Lanes: At 9:00 am PST 75 min delay 2 lane(s) open
Sentri Lanes: At 9:00 am PST 5 min delay 2 lane(s) open
Ready Lanes: At 9:00 am PST 60 min delay 3 lane(s) open
Border Notice: Calexico/East Ready Lane is open west side of port; Passenger Hrs Mon-Fri 6:00AM to Midnight, Sat/Sun 6:00AM to Midnight. Tune into AM 1610 for border crossing info
